column6: A basic camera for basic needs
column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2021
column14: If you need something to get a basic picture of things in your way this will work, but if you want a clear picture for accident identification this will not work. Picture is not very clear and the video screen in the mirror is very dim during the day. Also the mirror itself can flex when not positioned correctly which causes you to have a double vision type of view of the cars behind you.
